name: Two Floors
description:
A short platformer about switching gravity and trying over, over, and over. A fun way to kill a few minutes of sifting through games.

Game releases on Saturday, May 18 exactly 12 seconds after 6:30 AM EST. Wait 'till then to download ;)

Controls:

  • WASD — movement
  • LMB — dash
  • RMB — flip gravity

Follow me on Twitter for news about games ;D
